### NYC Restaurant Inspections

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
data("rest_inspec")
```

```{r}
res_df = rest_inspec |> 
  filter(boro == "Manhattan", 
         critical_flag == "Y", 
         substr(inspection_date,1,4) == "2019",
         !is.na(grade_date),
         !is.na(violation_description),
         !is.na(latitude),
         !is.na(longitude),
         startsWith(`inspection_type`, "Pre-permit")) |> 
  select(-camis, -boro)
```
